builds on: learned Rational Speech Acts ( RSA ) models

builds on.from sentence: Our work builds on a line of learned Rational Speech Acts ( RSA ) models , in which generated strings are selected to optimize the behav - Human - written A cheap coffee shop in riverside with a 5 out of 5 customer rating is Fitzbillies .

reference resolution.from sentence: The canonical presentation of the RSA framework ( Frank and Goodman , 2012 ) is grounded in reference resolution : models of speakers attempt to describe referents in the presence of distractors , and models of listeners attempt to resolve descriptors to referents .
